name: Silent Depth 3D Submarine Simulation
description: Submarine Simulation playing in WWII in the Pacific.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: XP Processor: Intel Atom Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Storage: 2 GB available space
